name: Imminent
description:
THIS IS AN ALPHA PATCH! THE GAME IS 'PLAYABLE', BUT NOT READY.

We plan on releasing this game on a ton of major systems, but for the Pre-Alpha phase, it'll be Linux, Mac, and Windows only. Sorry for any issues.

Multiplayer??? maybe... Story? Nope. Horde Mode? Ohhhhh yeahhhhh. More guns too!

Controls:

R: Restarts the game.

Esc: Exits the game.

WASD: Movement.

Left-Click: Shoot.
